Text.Value: No, you should keep them talking as long as you can, then you kill them. She taught me that.
I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.
I want to see my parents. And I don't care what happens to this one. She's been in my head long enough already. Do what you like. I know you'll choose well.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart addresses Player, steps away from Viconia

Text.Value: First I need answers.
She still has answers I need.
Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.

EditorData.stateContext: Viconia is on the floor, propped up by her right elbow. Her left hand is clasped to a wound in her side.

Text.Value: Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher in you.
She's just trying to rile you up.
What are you talking about?

All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side. And still, you threw it away.
She's no threat anymore. Let her go.
Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.

EditorData.NodeContext: Resignation. 'Those were my orders. That's that'

Text.Value: Let go, Mother. Embrace loss.
Sympathy is for the weak. I merely wanted to say my piece. I wanted her to know the cost of her education. Now do what you will.
No, it doesn't.
Kill her. Be done with this.
Kill her, or turn her loose. It doesn't matter. She's finished, either way.

EditorData.NodeContext: Spoken to the player re: Viconia. Matter-of-fact

Text.Value: Answer me!
Go. If you're wise, you'll vanish.
This is a waste of time. Kill her.
Let's kill her.
So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?
She doesn't care about any of us.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *DUPE* [Shadowheart] Retrieve Cine Dagger and strike Viconia on the ground, killing her.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.

Text.Value: They are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget. But they didn't forget.
The Dark Lady was wrong about you, girl. Too much kindness lurks in your heart. Aluve.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *DUPE* [Viconia] left hand on wound, stands up, turns and runs away.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)
EditorData.NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

Text.Value: Make it quick.
Such cruelty...
What are you doing? Come back and finish this yourself! You owe me that!
You deal with her then. I need to find my parents.
No, Shadowheart. We've won. You don't need anything from her.
So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.
I am adept at it. Aluve.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] [Viconia] left hand on wound, stands up, turns and runs away.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)

Text.Value: I doubt Shar will look too kindly on her failure - we all know how she treats those who disappoint her.
I know. But she's not lying. She made me in her image.
Why? Why me? Why all this effort?

I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.

EditorData.NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

Text.Value: She stands at the same crossroads you yourself once did, Viconia - but it seems you are not quite the teacher you thought.

EditorData.NodeContext: Watching Shadowheart walk off and leave Viconia to our mercy, satisfied that Shar has not won

Text.Value: Are you expecting sympathy?
Boo thinks you have had every chance to change your ways. Count yourself blessed it is not he who judges you today.

EditorData.NodeContext: Distaste, looking down on a defeated Viconia

Text.Value: My parents. Where are they?
Kill Viconia.
I draw near, my Lady...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] [Player] Retrieve Cine Dagger and strike Viconia on the ground, killing her.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.
EditorData.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death
EditorData.SFXTags: [KC] A slash as the player strikes Viconia with a dagger.
EditorData.VFXTags: [KC] A blood spray as the player strikes Viconia with a dagger.

Text.Value: They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.
Careful, girl. You may not like what you find.
You became my mission. To take a child of Selne's, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.
Go. Vanish as if you were dead.
They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.
Yes. Do it. Her embrace awaits me.
What do you want to do, Shadowheart?
I draw near, my Lady...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] [Player] Retrieve Cine Dagger and strike Viconia on the ground, killing her.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.
EditorData.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death
EditorData.SFXTags: [KC] A slash as the player strikes Viconia with a dagger.

Synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Shadowheart could have come here to lead a coup against Viconia and seize control of the Shar Grotto, or she could have turned from her faith and have come here to rescue her captive parents.
